document_description: Regulations 5765-2004 lay out a number of measures to legally frame energy efficiency objectives for air conditioners in Israel. The minimum energy efficiency duty details the selling conditions and refers to sub-regulations with regards to imports. The energy market duty clause stipulates that devices must be presented and sold with an official energy label on it indicating the energy rating score approved by a commissioner.
